title: Solar Tablet Fragment
summaries: Solar Tablet Fragments are post-Plantera Hardmode crafting materials used to craft the Solar Tablet, which summons the Solar Eclipse event. They are found in Lihzahrd Chests, and are dropped by Lihzahrds and Flying Snakes in the Jungle Temple.
